arStrings.szText: Gain a free {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c} shadow every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds when standing still. Each {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c} shadow grants {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} increased Damage Reduction.
When standing still, gain free {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c} shadow that grants {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} increased Damage Reduction.
